data.message:
I have a problem and i figure you can either help me or point me in the direction of the person i need to speak with . i've been scammed by a facebook advertiser who has taken my money and not delivered anything and has taken down the associated website  The advertiser is one of the many recently advertising Ralph Lauren Polo apparel on facebook . Any assistance you can give me would be sincerely appreciated . Regards,
Dwight Sangster
